attributes.action: take action on behalf of the electorate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Robust action should be taken to remove untaxed and cloned vehicles from the roads.
Any vehicle being stopped should not be allowed to continue (They would be removed to a secure compound) until the necessary back fees are paid.  This would include Road fund licence, insurance and MOT's, expenses and fines.
This would also help in reducing use of these vehicles for criminal purposes.
It would also reduce insurance costs to the honest motorist.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
